lead_paragraph: Journeyman goalie Chad Johnson, in his first season with Calgary, is beginning to show he can be a source of stability for the up-and-down Flames.

headline.print_headline: Johnson Gets Another Shutout, Flames Beat Jackets 2-0
headline.main: Johnson Gets Another Shutout, Flames Beat Jackets 2-0
